lexUnit.name: sigh.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long, deep, audible exhalation expressing sadness, tiredness, relief, etc.

sentence.text: The ball sailed over the Stockade , he said , and the crowd 's sigh followed its arc the whole way .
The sentence was stifled under the thick cushion of Emilia 's sigh .
Kiku 's sigh was exaggerated .
The pub landlord 's sigh of relief metamorphoses into a gigantic shit-eating grin as BACK TO THE PLANET and entourage depart his suit-heavy establishment .
Guido gave a brief sigh .
She set everything out on the table , then stared at the blank sheet of paper in front of her and gave a small sigh .
Then she braced herself , heaving a deep sigh .
Folding her against him , he gave a long sigh , then moved her back so that he could look into her face .
He nodded and gave a deep sigh .
She gave a long sigh .
With a long sigh , she turned to face him .
With a heavy sigh she lay back on the pile of beach cushions , closing her eyes against the early-morning sun , already climbing high in the sky .
Laura told her with a heavy sigh .
Benstede pursed his lips and let out a long sigh .
I swallow , take a long sigh and look at him .
Claudia heaved a huge sigh and tried to smile .
George breathed a deep sigh .
The dragon heaved a huge sigh of relief and politely turned his head to let out a huge smoky belch ; then he settled down for a dragon-like snooze .
She gave a weary sigh .
Philpott gave a resigned sigh .
She gave a small sigh .
Rex made a major sigh .
She breathed a sigh of relief as he made no attempt to continue the discussion .
Maggie gave a great sigh of exasperation .
She gazed up at it with a deep sigh of pleasure .
Briant allowed himself a small sigh of irritation .
“ I 'll have the use of a locker at the airport … ” she trailed off with a despondent sigh .
Uncle Philip sighed heavily , the sigh of a man being thankful for exceedingly small mercies .
